channel.title: If you were Valve, how would you announce and release HL2:ep3?
channel.description:
Here is what I would do:
Step 1: completely finish the game in silence
Step 2: make a teaser trailer simply stating that "Lamarr will be returning."
Step 3: set the internal release date for a week after E3
Step 4: at E3, make your whole appearance there to show off DOTA 2
Step 5: at the end of E3, casually announce Ep3 is coming out next week
Step 6: watch the ensuing chaos
Step 7: release it a day late
Step 8: success!!!
Whats your ideas?

item.title: If you were Valve, how would you announce and release HL2:ep3?
item.dc:creator: gibbelin
item.description:
RestlessMind:

You mean some people think they should have never made Half Life 2 with the Combine story and all? That’s crazy.

It’s true, I remember the backlash. It was just a little fart of hatred amidst a Class 5 Hurricane of praise, but there were definitely some very vocal whiners who thought Valve had let the franchise down.

I’ve actually been a little disappointed by how afraid Valve has been to do new things with the last two episodes. Episode 2 brought some new elements into play, but I’m going to be very disappointed if the next chapter doesn’t mix it up immensely. HL2 was a totally new experience, I want that feeling again next time.
